name: Wok & Roll
description:
Created in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 game jam by Jake Ellis. Music and foley work by Derek Bertram. Fonts provided by Robert Thomson. 

-- THE STORY --

You are a chef, and you have decided to cook dice. No one knows the motive nor the reasoning, but they can't argue with the delicious results.

-- THE GOAL --

  • Get the dice total within the range that the recipe at the top right calls for.
  • Every time you add a dice, it needs to be rolled to cook it.
  • Once it's cooked, you can serve it up by pressing the blue button.
  • There are six stages in all, so good luck!

-- CONTROLS --

Left Mouse: Hold/release to shake the wok

Right Mouse: Add dice (if you have any left)

ESC: Pause game

E: Add salt (when unlocked)

Q: Add oil (when unlocked)
